name: The spider on the wall
description:
This short story has one ending. But you can die if you choose the wrong choices

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Disclaimer Warning

The story is purely fiction. None of it is real.

This game contains disturbing, unsettling imagery and depression themes, paranoia, death, mother issues, monsters, and one jumpscare.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Notes:

  • This is a linear story. There is one ending.
  • 20 min to complete the game.
  • All the pictures in the game are mine.
  • Thank you for playing.

Made with Renpy.
